name: Garry's Mod Wiki: Stylesheet Enhancement
description:
Enhances the visual look of the Garry's Mod wiki.

Features:
- Fixes page text appearing infront of navigation.
- Fixes page text being cut off on the left.
- Adds "Client"/"Server"/"Shared" text to functions.
additional_info:
Version 1.2:
- Added "Client"/"Server"/"Shared" text to function definitions.
Version 1.1:
- Fix text being cut off on the left side.
Version 1.0:
- Release
